textBox.richText: I’ve been adding to my films lists. World history topics are so big! There are a ton of entries for Industrialization, Imperialism and the Great War, the three pages most recently added. As I have noted in the top corner of each film page, please keep in mind that these films have not been sorted apart from designation as either documentary or feature presentation. I plan to do this in time, but I feel that for now it is most important that I get each page populated with initial content before I go back and thin out selections and such. For the moment, please browse and read the descriptions to see if a film is worth your time. Films Dealing with the Great War Films Dealing with Industrialization Films Dealing with Imperialism
